scripts.android: npm run update.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && tns run android
scripts.update.shared.mobile: npm run prepare.shared && cd subular-mobile && npm install && npm install
scripts.ios: npm run update.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && tns run ios
scripts.ios.webpack: npm run update.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && npm run start-ios-bundle
scripts.prepare.shared: tsc --p tsconfig.json && cd subular-shared-dist && npm i
